r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Fixed: Garbage value for VARCHAR type OUT variable of stored-procedure Fixed: Compilation error with php-5.4.x i5/OS: Remove compile errors during IBM i compiles due to chaining support i5/OS: Allow use of V6+ (SQL_ATTR_INFO_ACCTSTR, SQL_ATTR_INFO_APPLNAME, SQL_ATTR_INFO_PROGRAMID, SQL_ATTR_INFO_USERID, SQL_ATTR_INFO_WRKSTNNAME connection attributes)
